{{short description|2019 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 50|location=San Diego, California|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=2 August - 5 August [[2019]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 49]]|next=[[Mythcon 51]]}}'''Mythcon 50''' was the fiftieth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

* '''Theme:''' "Looking Back, Moving Forward"
* '''Guests of Honor:''' [[Verlyn Flieger]] ([[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar), and Tim Powers (fantasy author)
